recommended_action: Condition: High vibration instability indicating bearing damage, rotor imbalance, or internal mechanical faults. Actions: Inspect bearings and rotor alignment; verify foundation stability; reduce operating speed if possible; schedule corrective maintenance.

Condition: Rapid compressor temperature rise indicating lubrication failure, friction escalation, or abnormal compression behavior. Actions: Verify lubrication flow immediately; inspect cooling effectiveness; reduce load and monitor closely.

Condition: Sustained compressor overload indicating excessive demand, downstream restriction, or control system mismatch. Actions: Inspect discharge line restrictions; verify control settings; reduce operating load; schedule system inspection.
